verses.verse: Now accept <S%G4355><s%> one who is weak <S%G770><s%> in faith, <S%G4102><s%> but not <S%G3361><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> disputes <S%G1253><s%> over opinions. <S%G1261><s%>

<S%G3303><s%> One <S%G3739><s%> man has faith <S%G4100><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> all things, <S%G3956><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> he who is weak <S%G770><s%> eats <S%G2068><s%> only vegetables. <S%G3001><s%>

Don't <S%G3361><s%> let <S%G1848><s%> him who eats <S%G2068><s%> despise <S%G1848><s%> him who doesn't <S%G3361><s%> eat. <S%G2068><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Don't <S%G3361><s%> let <S%G2919><s%> him who doesn't <S%G3361><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> him who eats, <S%G2068><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has accepted <S%G4355><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Who <S%G5101><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> who judge <S%G2919><s%> another <S%G245><s%>'s servant? <S%G3610><s%> To his own <S%G2398><s%> lord <S%G2962><s%> he stands <S%G4739><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> falls. <S%G4098><s%> Yes, <S%G1161><s%> he will be made <S%G2476><s%> to stand, <S%G1063><s%> for God <S%G2316><s%> has <S%G2076><s%> power <S%G1415><s%> to make <S%G2476><s%> him <S%G846><s%> stand. <S%G2476><s%>

One man <S%G3739><s%> esteems <S%G2919><s%> one day <S%G2250><s%> as more <S%G3844><s%> important. <S%G1161><s%> Another <S%G1161><s%> esteems <S%G2919><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> alike. <S%G4135><s%> Let each man <S%G1538><s%> be fully assured <S%G4135><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> mind. <S%G3563><s%>

He who observes <S%G5426><s%> the day, <S%G2250><s%> observes <S%G5426><s%> it to the Lord; <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he who does not <S%G3361><s%> observe <S%G5426><s%> the day, <S%G2250><s%> to the Lord <S%G2962><s%> he does <S%G5426><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> observe <S%G5426><s%> it. <S%G2068><s%> He who eats, eats <S%G2068><s%> to the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he gives <S%G2168><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> thanks. <S%G2168><s%> He who doesn't <S%G3361><s%> eat, <S%G2068><s%> to the Lord <S%G2962><s%> he doesn't <S%G3756><s%> eat, <S%G2068><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gives <S%G2168><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> thanks. <S%G2168><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> of us <S%G2257><s%> lives <S%G2198><s%> to himself, <S%G1438><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> dies <S%G599><s%> to himself. <S%G1438><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> <S%G99999><s%> we live, <S%G2198><s%> we live <S%G2198><s%> to the Lord. <S%G2962><s%> Or <S%G5037><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> we die, <S%G599><s%> we die <S%G599><s%> to the Lord. <S%G2962><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> <S%G99999><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> we live <S%G2198><s%> or <S%G1437><s%> <S%G99999><s%> die, <S%G599><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>'s.

For <S%G1063><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> this end <S%G5124><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> <S%G2532><s%> died, <S%G599><s%> <S%G2532><s%> rose, <S%G450><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lived <S%G326><s%> again, <S%G2443><s%> that he might be Lord <S%G2961><s%> of both <S%G2532><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the living. <S%G2198><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> you, <S%G5101><s%> why do <S%G2919><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> brother? <S%G80><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G2532><s%> you again, <S%G5101><s%> why do <S%G1848><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> despise <S%G1848><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> brother? <S%G80><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> we will <S%G3936><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> stand <S%G3936><s%> before the judgment seat <S%G968><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> it <S%G1473><s%> is written, <S%G1125><s%> <S%G1473><s%>"'As I live, <S%G2198><s%>' says <S%G3004><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> <S%G1698><s%> 'to me every <S%G3956><s%> knee <S%G1119><s%> will bow. <S%G2578><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> tongue <S%G1100><s%> will confess <S%G1843><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>'"
So <S%G686><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> each one <S%G1538><s%> of us <S%G2257><s%> will give <S%G1325><s%> account <S%G3056><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> let <S%G2919><s%>'s not <S%G3371><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> one another <S%G240><s%> any more, <S%G3371><s%> but <S%G235><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> rather, <S%G3123><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> no man <S%G3361><s%> put <S%G5087><s%> a stumbling block <S%G4348><s%> in <S%G80><s%> his brother <S%G80><s%>'s way, or <S%G2228><s%> an occasion for falling. <S%G4625><s%>

I know, <S%G1492><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> am persuaded <S%G3982><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> is unclean <S%G2839><s%> of <S%G1223><s%> itself; <S%G1487><s%> except <S%G3361><s%> that to him who considers <S%G3049><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> unclean, <S%G2839><s%> to him <S%G1565><s%> it is unclean. <S%G2839><s%>

Yet <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of food <S%G1033><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> is grieved, <S%G3076><s%> <S%G3765><s%> you <S%G4043><s%> walk no <S%G3765><s%> longer <S%G2596><s%> in love. <S%G26><s%> Don't <S%G3361><s%> destroy <S%G622><s%> with <S%G1033><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> food <S%G1033><s%> him <S%G1565><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> died. <S%G599><s%>
Then <S%G3767><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> let <S%G987><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> good <S%G18><s%> be slandered, <S%G987><s%>

for <S%G1063><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> eating <S%G1035><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drinking, <S%G4213><s%> but <S%G235><s%> righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> <S%G2532><s%> peace, <S%G1515><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he who <S%G1398><s%> serves <S%G1398><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> these things <S%G5125><s%> is acceptable <S%G2101><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> approved <S%G1384><s%> by men. <S%G444><s%>

So then, <S%G3767><s%> let us <S%G1377><s%> follow after <S%G1377><s%> things <S%G3588><s%> which make for peace, <S%G1515><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> things <S%G3588><s%> by which <S%G1519><s%> we may build <S%G3619><s%> one another up. <S%G240><s%>

Don't <S%G3361><s%> overthrow <S%G2647><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>'s work <S%G2041><s%> for <S%G1752><s%> food <S%G1033><s%>'s sake. <S%G3956><s%> All things indeed <S%G3303><s%> are clean, <S%G2513><s%> however <S%G235><s%> it is evil <S%G2556><s%> for that man <S%G444><s%> who creates a stumbling <S%G4348><s%> block by <S%G1223><s%> eating. <S%G2068><s%>

It is good <S%G2570><s%> to not <S%G3361><s%> eat <S%G5315><s%> meat, <S%G2907><s%> <S%G3366><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%> wine, <S%G3631><s%> nor <S%G3366><s%> do anything by which <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> stumbles, <S%G4350><s%> is <S%G2228><s%> offended, <S%G4624><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> is made weak. <S%G770><s%>

Do you <S%G4771><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> faith? <S%G4102><s%> Have <S%G2192><s%> it to <S%G2596><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%> Happy <S%G3107><s%> is he who doesn't <S%G3361><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> he approves. <S%G1381><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> he who doubts <S%G1252><s%> is condemned <S%G2632><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> he eats, <S%G5315><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> it isn't <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> faith; <S%G4102><s%> and whatever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3739><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> sin. <S%G266><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> to him who is able <S%G1410><s%> to establish <S%G4741><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to my <S%G3450><s%> Good News <S%G2098><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the preaching of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the revelation <S%G602><s%> of the mystery <S%G3466><s%> which has been kept secret <S%G4601><s%> through long <S%G5550><s%> ages, <S%G166><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> is revealed, <S%G5319><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the Scriptures <S%G1124><s%> of the prophets, <S%G4397><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the commandment <S%G2003><s%> of the eternal <S%G166><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> is made known <S%G1107><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> obedience <S%G5218><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the nations; <S%G1484><s%> to the only <S%G3441><s%> wise <S%G4680><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> to whom be the glory <S%G1391><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forever! <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
